description: In her new memoir, “The Kennedy Chronicles: The Golden Age of MTV Through Rose-Colored Glasses,” VJ-turned-DJ-turned-memoirist Lisa “Kennedy” Montgomery dishes on rock star encounters and witnessing MTV from within.  This excerpt finds her in the Los Angeles bed of Nine Inch Nails’ Trent Reznor – but as platonic friends, surprised by a natural disaster for […]
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

In her new memoir, “The Kennedy Chronicles: The Golden Age of MTV Through Rose-Colored Glasses,” VJ-turned-DJ-turned-memoirist Lisa “Kennedy” Montgomery dishes on rock star encounters and witnessing MTV from within.  This excerpt finds her in the Los Angeles bed of Nine Inch Nails’ Trent Reznor – but as platonic friends, surprised by a natural disaster for which they’re clearly not prepared.

"},{"content":"
","type":"text/html"}]

title: Surviving an Earthquake with Trent Reznor
